item.title: Etch-a-Sketch
item.author: user@example.com (Hugo Author)
item.description: I’m working through The Odin Project and yesterday I completed Etch-a-Sketch project fromt the curriculum. Seeing it come alive brought me a lot more of joy than I expected. Etch-a-Sketch on my laptop My friends have also sent me a coupel of cool drawings made with it: (mobile devices require to click to colour, instead of hovering over the squares. So it makes it much easier to draw) I uploaded it to github so anyone can play with it:
